synopsis.text:
Go on a thrilling adventure with Yoko Nakajima, an ordinary high school student who stands out due to her vibrant red hair. Yoko's life takes an unexpected turn when a golden-haired stranger named Keiki appears in her classroom, pledges his allegiance, and urges her to take the throne. Before she can make sense of the situation, Yoko, along with her classmates Yuka and Ikuya, are whisked away to a fantastical world filled with magic, swords, and menacing demon-like creatures.

In this new world, Yoko and her friends face numerous challenges as they search for Keiki and a way back home. Along the way, they encounter locals who seem to pose threats and obstacles in their journey. As Yoko navigates through this complex and richly mythological realm, she must find the strength within herself to not only survive but also fulfill her destined role.

Based on the text novels by Ono Fuyumi, this anime tells the story of Yoko Nakajima and others who find themselves in this enchanting world of The Twelve Kingdoms. Will Yoko rise to the occasion and embrace her destiny, or will she succumb to the trials that lie ahead? Join Yoko and her friends in this captivating tale of growth, friendship, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
